text: @WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice So many birds and mammals will die, including fledglings. There are Cetti's warbler in the scrub, a schedule 1 species, destruction of their nests is simply illegal @DevonLiveNews @IoloWilliams2 @ChrisGPackham

@Biffa @amandamilling @EnvAgency @TipStench
 Woke this am yet again to the rancid stench from #PoplarsLandfill in #Cannock ,that's 4 days out of five. Spoke yesterday to local customer who'd spent six grand on garden renovations but fears it's been rendered un usable by #Biffa
